questions: Weight control has become a large business because   _  .
article:
These days people more and more care for their weight. For example, as many as 70,000,000 Americans are perhaps on weight- reducing diets, and weight control has become very large business .
There are different kinds of diet foods in the markets such as soft drinks, diet cakes, diet salad dressings. Dieters also spend much money on diet pills, exercise machines and so on . Each year scores of new diets become popular all over America. they have such names as the Miracle ( ) Diet , the Nine -Day Wonder diet , and the Easy 24- Hour Diet .There is even one called the Ice Cream diet, which advises the dieter to eat only ice cream for lunch and dinner! For dieters who can not lose weight on their own, there are many well-prepared diet groups , which give their help and encouragement.
